plot: When we are faced with death, we can rediscover life. A nameless man, who is terminally ill, allows us to experience the world through his eyes and ears and follow him on his journey to acceptance.
title: Another Green World
plot_es: When we are faced with death, we can rediscover life. A nameless man, who is terminally ill, allows us to experience the world through his eyes and ears and follow him on his journey to acceptance.
plot_en: When we are faced with death, we can rediscover life. A nameless man, who is terminally ill, allows us to experience the world through his eyes and ears and follow him on his journey to acceptance.
